Professional Services
Professional Services means services provided by or 
on behalf of the Insured to a Third-Party Client:
(i)
in the Insured’s capacity as an architect or
engineer, landscape architect, interior designer 
or space planner;
(ii)
in certification of elements of construction for
compliance with laws, regulations, codes of
practice, and construction plans;
(iii)	
as a construction manager, program manager, 
project manager, owner’s representative,
including design assist services and
constructability reviews; or

in managing Building
